name: Tiki Island
description:
You've accumulated a large amount of gold through mysterious circumstances on an island in the middle of nowhere? Nice! An army of ruthless undead pirates are trying to steal it away from you and claim it as their own? Uh-oh!

Tiki Island is a short tower defence project, developed by a Master's student at The University of Bolton. It is set on Tiki Island - a tropical paradise with a wicked curse. All of the sea bandits who have died there over the decades are now its prisoners forever - not quite dead and still very hungry for gold. Protect your treasures from them by purchasing and upgrading futuristic turret robots that use never-before-seen technology and defeat 5 waves of undead Tiki Island pirates!

Credits

Assets: 

Modular Low Poly Robots

Low Poly Style Deluxe 2: Tropical Environment

And thank you, Nick Lee, for the sound design!
